attributes.action: Test ALL NHS STAFF for Covid19 immediately
attributes.additional_details: It's imperative it should be done IMMEDIATELY . We NEED our NHS STAFF healthy and well for them to continue their massive effort they give to us . DO IT AND DO IT NOW NOT ONE MORE WASTED
attributes.background: Start testing ALL NHS STAFF immediately.  Tomorrow will be TO LATE.  Save our NHS

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
